Text: Improving customer communications and satisfactionJeff I am Andy Liu Cofounder and President of NetConversions a company based in Seattle Our company helps Fortune Global companies improve their online presence and email communications to better serve customers Our True UsabilityTM solution identifies areas of improvement that will ensure better customer experience thus driving more customers to pay their bills online or to conserve more energy or to facilitate communication Given your business objectives we can help you achieve it on a large scale We can help launch an email campaign that improves each time an email is opened Our technology is based on leading research from Wharton and UTAustin professors and have been proven to be successful I would like to share with you some of the solutions we use to help our clients realize their business goals Id be happy to speak with you over the phone What time would be most convenient for you Friday May th at am or Monday May th at am Thanks Best regards Andy Liu President NetConversions Inc O x F
